author: Fadel Allassan
title: Las Vegas mayor calls for city to reopen: "We've had viruses for years"
description: Las Vegas Mayor Carolyn Goodman told CNN on Wednesday that she believes it's time to reopen the city despite the ongoing threat of the coronavirus, calling Nevada's statewide lockdown "total insanity."Why it matters: As CNN's Anderson Cooper repeatedly pointe…
content:
Las Vegas Mayor Carolyn Goodman told CNN on Wednesday that she believes it's time to reopen the city despite the ongoing threat of the coronavirus, calling Nevada's statewide lockdown "total insanity."
